mapper.insert: insert into oc_language (language_id, name, code, locale, image, directory, sort_order, status) values (#{languageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update oc_language set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locale = #{locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, directory = #{directory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT} where language_id = #{languageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select language_id, name, code, locale, image, directory, sort_order, status from oc_language
